thread.section_title: MyMusicFolders.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyMusicFolders.com | mymusicfolders.com
thread.title: Joan

author: Joan
title: Joan
text: I already had an excellent music folder from this company, but needed a larger ring set. The website didn't work properly and when I called, the woman who waited on me was apologetic and very helpful. The postage would have been about 4 times the cost of the item, but the woman checked and found a cheaper way to send it. The rings are a good size and the service was great!
